message_box_autostart_script_created: The autostart script was successfully created!
message_box_autostart_script_updated: The autostart script has been successfully updated!
message_box_autostart_script_path_copied: The path to the file has been copied to the clipboard.
message_box_autostart_script_already_add:
If you have already added a script to OBS before, you can safely close this message.
If not, follow the instructions below.
message_box_autostart_script_need_to_add: Now you need to add it to OBS.
message_box_autostart_script_instruction:
You need to open OBS and go to the script settings window.
Tools -> Scripts.
Then click on the + button, paste the path from the clipboard in the 'File Name' field and click Open.

Summary: Tools -> Scripts -> + button -> Paste the path in the 'File Name' field -> click Open.

After that, {0} will automatically start with OBS.
about_window_description: This is a program for displaying notifications from OBS. In order for this program to work, you need to install OBS version 28+ with the built-in 'obs-websocket' version 5+.
settings_window_top_hint: In order for this application to work you need to connect to the obs-websocket plugin.
settings_window_top_hint_tooltip:
1. Tools - 2. WebSocket Server Settings - 3. Enable WebSocket server
?. Optional 'Enable Authentication'. To find out the current password, click 'Show Connect Info'.
Don't forget to click Apply after making changes to the server.
settings_window_report_bug: Report a bug or suggest a feature.
settings_window_password_warning: The password will be saved in a local file
settings_window_run_with_windows_admin_e:
(unavailable due to an error.
Try to run as administrator)
settings_window_run_with_obs_hint: Create or update a script to run the program automatically.
